sn36.23:4.1: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn36.23:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn36.23:4.4: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamā vedanāsamudayagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.23:4.6: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.23:5.2: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā.
sn36.23:5.7: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn36.23:5.10: Yaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo;
sn36.23:5.11: yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo;
sn36.23:5.12: yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇan”ti.
